title: AI Agent Building
text: Developing intelligent AI agents and automation solutions for businesses. Specialized in building conversational AI, workflow automation, and machine learning integrations to streamline operations.

title: Full Stack Development
text: End-to-end web application development using React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and Django. From database design to responsive frontend interfaces, delivering scalable solutions for 21K+ users.

title: WordPress Development
text: Custom WordPress websites, theme development, and plugin creation. Specialized in building dynamic, SEO-optimized sites with custom functionality and seamless user experiences.

title: Technical Writing
text: Creating comprehensive technical documentation, API guides, and developer resources. Experienced in writing clear, actionable content that bridges the gap between complex technology and user understanding.
